ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the night and all it shrouds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the night and all it gathers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the night and what it enfolds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or by the night in which things all come together to rest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the night and all that gathers in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the night and what it Wasaqa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the night and that which it drives on,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the night and what it envelops
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And by the night and all that it enshroudeth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by the night and what it covers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the night and that which it driveth together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the night and what it is fraught with,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the night and whatever it gathers in its darkness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the night and all that it envelops;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And by the night, and what it covers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the night and what it envelops
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:17] and [by] the night and what it envelops, [what] it brings together of creatures and otherwise that have entered into it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And by the night and all that it enshroudeth) and I swear by the night and that which returns to its place when the night falls,
